epoch_id.description: The epoch id at which the weight was calculated.

global_weight.description: The global weight of the contract.

share.description: The share the address has of the rewards at the particular timestamp.

weight.description: The weight of the address at the given timestamp.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
